title: Mike P. on His Choice to Remain a Virgin, Plus: Tayshia Discusses Blake’s Return
description:
“The Bachelorette’s” Mike P. opens up to Becca and guest co-host Tayshia about his choice to remain a virgin until marriage and discusses the importance of honoring your partner. Mike also reveals his first reaction when learning about Katie being “sex-positive.” Plus, Mike shares why he felt compelled to speak up for the group at the Rose Ceremony.   

Then, Tayshia shares the conversation she had with Blake when he came on the show to meet Katie and what she thought about him returning this season. 

“Bachelor Happy Hour” has exclusive interviews every week. Watch “The Bachelorette” on ABC and listen to “Bachelor Happy Hour” the next morning.  

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
